summary: Provides a dictionary-based wrapper that applies a random torchvision transform to selected tensor entries, integrating the augmentation into MONAI pipelines and ensuring each call recomputes the random operation.
business_intent: Allow stochastic image augmentations from the torchvision library to be used seamlessly in MONAI data processing pipelines that operate on dictionaries of tensors, while handling missing keys and preventing caching from skipping random transforms.
